Package helper

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.Event

  • public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a node in the scenario tree with probability, test result, cost and all other relevant values
    Author:
    RamonaZauner

    • Constructor Summary

      Default constructor to initialize an event with -1 and null values

      • calculateTotalCost

        public void calculateTotalCost​(double c,
                               double K,
                               double phi,
                               int gamma_c,
                               double alpha)
        Calculates total cost and thereby differentiates between final and not final events
        Parameters:
        c - construction cost
        K - setup cost
        phi - penalty cost
        gamma_c - treshold for positive clinical trial outcome regarding all successful test results
        alpha - yearly discount factor

      • deleteCostCalculation

        public void deleteCostCalculation​()
        Deletes cost calculation from event for further cost calculation
